value: Hello young slave and welcome to the Colosseum of Rome. Now you have to fight as a gladiator with the help of your ||creature|| against opponents and their creatures to obtain the emperors favour and attain freedom.
title: Spartacus:

value: My name is Spartacus and I'm already a famous gladiator. I'll accompany you on your way to liberty and support you wherever I can.
title: Spartacus:

value: Horn
Listen! The horn calls us for the first fight! Good luck my friend.
title: Spartacus

value: You are attacked by a gladiator and his Lop
(Tutorial)

That was impressive, you did a good job! And look your ||creature|| went one level up. But there's still a long way to go on wich you have to fight a lot. From now I'm not going to help you with your fights anymore, but don't worry because you'll gain more and more experience and your ||creature|| will become stronger. Furthermore you will gain money to buy new creatures. Look, your next enemy is already waiting for you!
title: Spartacus:

value: Horn
I have to leave you alone now. Try your best!
title: Spartacus:

value: You won't obstruct me on my way to liberty!
title: Gladiator:

value: You are attacked by a gladiator and his Cricetinae.
Your ||creature|| goes one level up.
horn
You are my last chance to become a free man, so please forgive me.
title: Gladiator:

value: You are attacked by a gladiator and his Papilio.
Your ||creature|| goes one level up.
horn
You are attacked by a gladiator and his Escargon.
Your ||creature|| goes one level up.
horn
You are attacked by a gladiator and his Aestas.
Your ||creature|| goes one level up.
horn
You are attacked by a gladiator and his Combus.
Your ||creature|| goes one level up.
Ave! Today we saw many spectecular fights and met new gladiators. We are going to coninue tomorrow.
title: Caesar:

value: You arrive at your accomodation.
You are one of the rookies, aren't you? Your fights looked very impressive. Do you want to train with me?
title: Stranger:

value: You follow the stranger to the drill ground. You are attacked by a Souri.
Your ||creature|| goes one level up.
You are attacked by an Aestas.
Your ||creature|| goes one level up.
You are attacked by an Oedipus.
Your ||creature|| goes one level up.
Well done, my friend. I wasn't wrong about your strength, you have the potential to be a succesfull gladiator - or to become a free man. I am tired now, let's rest until tomorrow.
title: Stranger:

value: Ave! Now it's time for the highlight of the morning: A grand fight between the battle-tested fighter Scipio and a newcoming gladiator we saw yesterday!
title: Caesar:

value: horn
You are attacked by the gladiator Scipio and his Lizzle.
Your ||creature|| goes one level up.
Everyone celebrates you for defeating Scipio. As a reward you don't have to fight someone else today. You return to the accomodation and meet the stranger you trained with yesterday.

Congratulations! Your fight was amazing. As I said, slowly but surely you become famous. On the one hand you made a bg step towards liberty, on the other hand you will have to fight against stronger gladiators, so you should not stop training. By the way, i didn't introduce myself yet, did I? My name is Quintus.
title: Stranger:

value: You are following Quintus to the drill ground.
Do you see the people over there? You better stay away from these guys. They think it is fun to bully younger gladiators, especially those who have sudden succes
